spec_data.Name: container-storage-setup
spec_data.Description:
This is a simple service to configure Container Runtimes to use an LVM-managed
thin pool.  It also supports auto-growing both the pool as well
as the root logical volume and partition table.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Thu 26 Oct 2017 08:10:18 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: A simple service to setup container storage devices
